no-show.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone who does not arrive or appear somewhere they were expected to be, for example at a restaurant or a meeting
no-show.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The bad weather meant there were a lot of no-shows at the game.
no-show.translation[1].definitions[0].de: someone who is expected at a restaurant to eat or at an airport to take a plane but does not arrive, or an occasion when this happens
no-show.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Most airlines guard against the threat of no-shows by overbooking flights.
